Machine Learning 2024 Workshop Info Schedule Pre-work

Machine Learning 2024 Faculty: David Wishart, and Nia Hughes September 7, 2024 - September 8, 2024 Workshop Info Welcome to the 2024 Machine Learning Canadian Bioinformatics Workshop webpage! Schedule Time (EDT) September 7 Time (EDT) September 8 9:45 Virtual Arrivals 9:45 Virtual Arrivals 10:00 Welcome and Technology Check (Nia Hughes) 10:00 Module 5: Gene Prediction with NNs (Lecture and Lab) 10:45 Module 1: Introduction to Machine Learning (Lecture) 12:00 Break (30 mins) 12:15 Break (30 mins) 12:30 Module 6: Machine Learning with Keras and Scikit-learn (Lecture and Lab) 12:45 Module 2: Decision Trees (Lecture and Lab) 14:00 Break + Class Photo (1 hr) 14:15 Break (45 mins) 15:00 Module 7: Machine Learning with Keras and Scikit-learn (Lecture and Lab) 15:00 Module 3: Neural Networks (Lecture and Lab) 16:00 Break (30 mins) 16:30 Break (30 mins) 16:30 Module 8: Information Extraction with ChatGPT (Lecture and Lab) 17:00 Module 4: Neural Networks for secondary structure (Lecture and Homework) 17:45 Survey and Closing Remarks 18:00 End of Day 1 18:00 End of Day 2 Pre-work You can find your pre-work here.
